fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2022e1.equipments.heater

Class ThermostatedHeater

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2022e1.equipments.heater.ThermostatedHeater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, HeaterImplementationI

    public class ThermostatedHeater
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
implements HeaterImplementationI
    The class ThermostatedHeater a thermostated heater component.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant       targetTemperature >= -50.0 && targetTemperature <= 50.0

    Created on : 2021-09-10

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
